Repeat: k1, (k1-b, k1) into the double yarn over of the previous row; k1, p3
k2 tog, (yo) twice, ssk; skip next 2 stitches and knit into third stitch, then knit into second stitch, then knit into first stitch, then slip all 3 stitches from needle together
k1, (k1-b, k1) into the double yarn over of the previous row; k1, p3
